name: The Sheep Dolly
description:
You embody a sheep that keeps running from a farm that only wants her wool. You must face with her the danger of the real life: wolfs and big rocks.

You must take as much coins as you can and survive all the time that you can.


Controls

Type "jump" to make Dolly jump and reach platforms or evade rocks.

Type the word over the Wolf to debilitate him.

Team

Jesé Romero Arbelo - Developer

Jordi Menéndez Calvo - 2D Designer

Juan St. Mary - 2D Designer

Music - Melquiades Galván Mayor
